ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

Notes: 999= Missing Data

ElementDescription: Number of days from study baseline to date of visit
Start date of medication, calculated from randomization date
Stop date of medication, calculated from randomization date

Notes:
The FSEQNO variable in the ADJ form has a special interpretation compared to other forms.
For example, ADJ FSEQNO of '1' can be thought of as being '001', FSEQNO of '2' can be thought of as
being '002', and FSEQNO of '3' can be thought of as being '003'.
The first digit of FSEQNO relates to the corresponding ENF sequence number at that visit and the third
digit relates to the specific adjudicator who completed the adjudication form.

Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: Indicator for Addition or Change In Blood Pressure Meds
Notes: 0=Otherwise; 1=At least one addition of or change in blood pressure medication

Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

Notes: 0=Otherwise; 1=At least one addition of or change in blood pressure medication

Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

Notes: 0=Otherwise; 1=At least one addition of or change in blood pressure medication

Notes: 0=No; 1= Yes
0=No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Primary reason for the participant's protocol violation/deviation
ValueRange: Early discont.; LLA; LVT; Non-Adherent; Rand. Err; Visit window; Sub Lack effic; Sub Side eff; Clin Lack effic; Clin Side eff; Treat site; Unwill proc; Unable cont; Interv ill; Other
Notes: Early discont.=Early treatment discontinuation; LLA=Start/stop/change LLA; LVT=Start/stop/change LVT ; Non-Adherent=Was not at least 50% adherent with taking study meds over the 5 months of follow-up (V7 ? V11) AND at least 50% adherent with taking study medsover the last month of the study (V11) ; Rand. Err=Randomization error ; Visit window=Outside visit window; Sub Lack effic=Subject's decision: Lack of efficacy of study medication; Sub Side eff=Subject's decision: Side effects of study medication; Clin Lack effic=Clinician's decision: Lack of efficacy of study medication; Clin Side eff=Clinician's decision: Side effects of study medication; Treat site=No longer wants to be treated at study site (or seeking treatment elsewhere); Unwill proc=Unwilling/unable to comply with study procedures; Unable cont=Unable to be contacted/schedule a follow-up; Interv ill=Intervening medical illness that precludes continued participaation in the study

ElementDescription: Date Of Visit for when LLA protocol violation occurred [converted to days from randomization]
Date Of Visit for when LVT protocol violation occurred [converted to days from randomization]

Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: Miscellaneous comments on study, interview, methodology relevant to this form data
